en.title: FE Making Inroads In Ghana, Africa!
en.content:
REPORT BY FE GHANA COUNTRY LICENSEE PASTOR JULIA. 

On the 07th of July 2009, a presentation was held at the Ghana National Sports Council to introduce FE's range of Quantum Science products to the sporting fraternity by FE's Ghana Country Licensee, Pastor Julia. About 70 people from the various groups that make up the Sports Council were present including  the Head of Marketing, Mr Daniel Otchere, the Protocol Officer, Mrs Fredrica and the Chief Executive Officer, Mr Worlanyo Agrah.

The audience was thrilled at the effects of the demonstrations especially the balancing and the lifting demos. There were talks on getting the Quantum Pendants for not only the sports men but the staff as well. Quantum Pendants  were presented to the Chief Executive Officer, Mr W. Agrah, and the Protocol Officer, who have since praised the abilities of the product.

meta.author: klhunter
